name: NSSearchField
desc: A text field optimized for performing text-based searches.

items.name: var delegate: NSSearchFieldDelegate?
items.desc: The delegate for the search field, or nil if the search field doesn’t have a delegate.

items.name: protocol NSSearchFieldDelegate
items.desc: A protocol that a search field delegate can use to determine when a search started or ended.

items.name: var searchMenuTemplate: NSMenu?
items.desc: The menu object used to dynamically construct the search field’s pop-up icon menu.

items.name: class let clearRecentsMenuItemTag: Int
items.desc: The menu item for clearing the current set of recent string searches in the menu.

items.name: class let noRecentsMenuItemTag: Int
items.desc: The menu item that describes a lack of recent search strings.

items.name: class let recentsMenuItemTag: Int
items.desc: The location of recent search strings in the “recents” menu group.

items.name: class let recentsTitleMenuItemTag: Int
items.desc: The menu item that provides the title of the menu group for recent search strings.

items.name: var sendsSearchStringImmediately: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value indicating whether the cell calls its action method immediately when an appropriate action occurs.

items.name: var sendsWholeSearchString: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value indicating whether the cell calls its search action method when the user clicks the search button or presses Return, or after each keystroke.

items.name: var recentSearches: [String]
items.desc: The list of recent search strings for the control.

items.name: var maximumRecents: Int
items.desc: The maximum number of search strings that can appear in the search menu.

items.name: var recentsAutosaveName: NSSearchField.RecentsAutosaveName?
items.desc: The name under which the search field automatically archives the list of recent search strings.

items.name: typealias NSSearchField.RecentsAutosaveName
items.desc: The string that stores the name under which a search field automatically archives a list of recent search strings.

items.name: var cancelButtonBounds: NSRect
items.desc: The rectangle for the cancel button within the bounds of the search field.

items.name: var searchButtonBounds: NSRect
items.desc: The rectangle for the search button within the bounds of the search field.

items.name: var searchTextBounds: NSRect
items.desc: The rectangle for the search text within the bounds of the search field.
